Package ca.cgjennings.spelling

Class SpellingList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<String>
      • ca.cgjennings.spelling.SpellingList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<String>, Collection<String>
    public class SpellingList
extends AbstractCollection<String>
    A spelling list is a list of words that can be used by a SpellingChecker.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(String string)
        Return true if string is found in the list. This is a simple membership test. To check spelling, you must use SpellingChecker.isCorrect(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        string - the string to test
        Returns:
        true if the string is in the word list

      • read

        public void read​(BufferedReader list,
                 boolean commaSeparated,
                 boolean ignoreComments)
          throws IOException
        Add words from a BufferedReader containing a list of words. Each non-empty line in this stream will be treated as a word to be added to the dictionary. If commaSeparated is true, then each line is treated as a sublist of words to be added where each word is separated by a comma and/or white space. If ignoreComments is true, lines starting with '#' will be ignored as comments.
        Parameters:
        list - the stream from which to fetch words
        ignoreComments - ignore comment lines
        commaSeparated - if true, treat lines as a out of words
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • remove

        public void remove​(String word)
        Remove a word from the out.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to remove

      • write

        public void write​(Writer out)
           throws IOException
        Write the contents of the list to a stream. The words are written one per line in sorted order.
        Parameters:
        out - the Writer to send the out to
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing the out

      • readCPLCompressed

        public void readCPLCompressed​(BufferedReader in)
                       throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeCPLCompressed

                        throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • sortedWordList

        public String[] sortedWordList()
        Create a sorted array containing all of the words in this list. The strings are sorted according to their natural order.
        Returns:
        a sorted array of the strings stored in this list
